content: Within The Webbed Hollow's Middle Hollow area, you will fight Buddha's Right Hand. Killing it will drop the Past Echo Key Item.

Within The Webbed Hollow's Middle Hollow area, you will fight Buddha's Right Hand. Killing it will drop the Past Echo Key Item.
